problem_text_cn: 如图,PA、PB是⊙O的切线,A、B是切点,∠P=60°,PA=2,⊙O的直径等于()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, PA and PB are the tangent lines of ⊙O, A and B are the tangent points, ∠P = N_0, PA = N_1, the diameter of ⊙O is equal to ()
raw_answer: 解:连接OP,如图．∵PA、PB是⊙O的切线,∴OA⊥AP,OB⊥BP,PA=PB,∴∠PAO=∠PBO=90°,∵∠APB=60°,∴∠AOB=120°,∵OP=OP．PA=PB,∴△OPA≌△OPB(HL),∴∠AOP=∠BOP=60°,∵PA=2,∴OA=\frac{2√{3}}{3},∴直径为\frac{4√{3}}{3},故选:B．
raw_comment: 本题考查了切线性质,是基础题型．
